TextView.android:text: Note: i) Linear change of DDM during field readings also indicates correct displacement sensitivity measurement as per ICAO Annex -10 Vol-I/DGCA CAR Ref 3.1.3.7\n ii) Nominal value are as recorded during last flight calibration of facility.
Note: As per CNS Circular No. 02 of 2014
(a) For all Cat ILS, the field readings upto ±35 deg shall be taken on monthly basis.
